attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned protest at the democratic deficit that we English suffer. We want MP's from Scottish and Welsh seats to be prevented from voting on matters that the devolved governments control and that the same MP's be prevented from holding Ministerial posts with influence over those areas devolved including the posts of Chancellor and Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
